article_title: BlueCross establishes retail presence in Harbison area
article_text: Now you can grab a meal at Bonefish Grill, catch a movie at Columbiana Grande theaters and buy a health insurance policy from BlueCross BlueShield of S.C. without having to return to your car.

article_metadata.news-keywords: BlueCross, BlueShield, SC, health, insurance, retail
